name: NSTableView.Style
desc: Contains the possible style values for a table view.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The system resolves the table view style based on the table view hierarchy.

items.name: case fullWidth
items.desc: The table view style resolves to a full-width style.

items.name: case inset
items.desc: The table view style resolves to an inset style.

items.name: case sourceList
items.desc: The table view style resolves to a source-list style.

items.name: case plain
items.desc: The table view style resolves to a plain style.
